words.source: H589 conj. + pers. pron. 1cs אֲנִי 'I'; KJV 'and I', ESV 'but I', NASB 'but I'

H6547 proper name; all trans. agree

H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English versions

H853 conj. + direct object marker; untranslated in English versions

H776 prep. b- + n.fs constr. אֶרֶץ 'land'; KJV 'in the land of', ESV 'in the land of', NASB 'in the land of'
